Reviews.Title: “Good price, great location.”

Reviews.Content: people renovations yes indeed cant beat price location amazing ocean front location nice stay anyway straight beach spend time sleep shower dont fancy

Reviews.Title: “We will be back (again)!”

Reviews.Content: am writing review am tired reading people putting hotel dont stay elsewhere yes updating location price staying love location owners day hosts thank weekend cant wait

Reviews.Title: “awesome trip”
Reviews.Author: richard b
Reviews.Content: spent 6 days weve 10 couple people little loud staff care personally people noisy call office monitor grounds night pool kept clean staff hard little remodeled expect pay prices family sleep clean told wife stay 10 vacation sea scape sincerely

Reviews.Content: price motel affordable people friendly motel located center board walk walking distance boardwalk offer motel clean suits staying recommending friends

Reviews.Title: “Loved it here!!”

Reviews.Content: decided ocean city time stayed motel loved price people friendly clean pool nice warm definitely staying hopefully summer recommend family trying budget means fancy purpose thank wonderful week

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!! Was afraid to stay there!!”

Reviews.Content: decided stay minute decision checked key found parking horrible alot luggage hope walk motel projects unreal 3 granddaughter petrified stay oh god smell door gag checked bathroom tub rust stains ceiling tiles covered black mold mildew refrigerator door shut little freezer inch thick ice totally unacceptable front office complained decided money leave meant drove home offer date credit coming management tried explain blame situation cleaning team oh tell youthey girls shorts tank tops told wasnt cleaning crews fault manager spray mold mildew didnt spend extra money replace ceiling tile quote tile tiles needless cant imagine whats tiles walls dangerous health

Reviews.Content: staying 11 maid service perfect teddy bears towels kids spend money fun expensive shower queen size beds refrigerator kitchen table maid servie cable tv pool office friendly cleanliness 11

Reviews.Title: “It"s old, retro, and totally awesome!!!!”

Reviews.Content: ive staying motel 2003 theyve happy wat reasonable paying 300 nite 2 beds bathroom balcony cuz name brand breezeway visit pool 2011 remember beach boards fun blow ur fun courtyard patron wonderful oldschool motel

Reviews.Title: “Great Price for location”
Reviews.Author: catpaws123
Reviews.Content: staying sea scape staff owners wonderful people keeping rates low help people able stil enjoy ocean ocean rich person stay hilton dont anyway bet own house looks shack else love sea scape donna richards

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely The Place To Stay!”
Reviews.Author: Shanxxbby
Reviews.Content: stayed time definitely returning august 2011 tidy staff wonderful cant expect hilton cheap prices wont extravagant unless pay hundreds night else comes ocean city sit day anyhow basically cleaned sleep stay directly near ocean boardwalk bad teenage daughters complain absolutely loved hotel mess times doesnt mean try balancing bills finances reservations checkin checkouts staff etc bet wouldnt perfect love hotel shot
